name: MusicVideos.Relationships
desc: The relationships for a music video resource.

items.name: albums
items.desc: The albums associated with the music video. By default, albums includes identifiers only. Fetch limits: 10 default, 10 maximum.

items.name: artists
items.desc: The artists associated with the music video. By default, artists includes identifiers only. Fetch limits: 10 default, 10 maximum.

items.name: genres
items.desc: The genres associated with the music video. By default, genres not included. Fetch limits: None.

items.name: library
items.desc: The library of a music video if added to library.Fetch limits: None.

items.name: songs
items.desc: The songs associated with the music video.Fetch limits: 10 default, 10 maximum.
